title: 01/31/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 01/31/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Tampa Bay Times reporter Rick Stroud about the future of Tom Brady. Are the reports accurate that he'll be retiring this off season? ESPN's Marcus Spears joins us to discuss what impressed him most about the Bengals comeback against the Chiefs. And Carson Palmer explains why he'd rather have Joe Burrow over Matt Stafford going into the Super Bowl.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Tampa Bay Times reporter Rick Stroud about the future of Tom Brady. Are the reports accurate that he'll be retiring this off season? ESPN's Marcus Spears joins us to discuss what impressed him most about the Bengals comeback against the Chiefs. And Carson Palmer explains why he'd rather have Joe Burrow over Matt Stafford going into the Super Bowl.
